original_title: El Roast de Santiago Segura. Amiguetes los justos
overview: Eight friends get together to present the real Santiago Segura. They are going to tell everything, but the question is whether Segura is going to let El Gran Wyoming, Anna Simón, Kiko Rivera, Angie, Alex de la Iglesia, Silvia Abril, Carlos Areces and Jorge Sanz reveal their secrets.
title: El Roast de Santiago Segura. Amiguetes los justos
